The enveloping silhouette made of a wool blend fabric is enriched by minimalist details such as the iconic triangle logo, reinterpreted in a conceptual way, which adds its iconic signature touch to the jacket with casual style.
details: Regular fit|Stand-up collar|Straight sleeve|Zipper and button closure|Welt pockets|Ribbed knit cuff|Drop shoulder|Straight hem|Shearling lining|Fabric triangle logo on the front

description: The soft and precious touch of cashmere gives this sporty down vest a refined character.

name: Medium-weight cashmere down jacket
description: This cashmere down jacket with a sporty style and contemporary design is characterized by enveloping lines, soft volumes, and sleek details.

name: Wool down jacket
description: The duality between sartorial elegance and sport inspires the design of this goose down jacket with a versatile hybrid design and pragmatic character. For sustainable care to preserve the product's characteristics and reduce microfiber shedding, we recommend not washing the item too often. Let the product air out after every use and have it dry cleaned at a specialized ecological dry cleaners.
details: Oversized fit|Notch lapel|Straight sleeves|Button closure|Flap pockets|Straight cuff|Wide shoulder|Straight hem|Elasticized drawstring|Lined and padded with goose down|With removable padded down liner|Knit triangle logo

name: Silk and leather blouson jacket
description: The play of contrasts between delicate silk and bold leather defines this blouson jacket with contemporary allure. The garment with pragmatic and sporty details, characterized by a collar with hood and zipper closure, is enriched by the enameled metal triangle logo.
details: Regular fit|Stand-up collar with hood|Straight sleeves|Zipper closure|Welt zipper pockets|Elasticized cuff|Regular shoulder|Straight hem|Elasticized drawstring|Lined|Leather insert|Enameled metal triangle logo on the front

name: Cotton blend vest
description: This cotton blend vest with stand-up collar and zipper closure features a contemporary design with sleek details. The style that reinterprets workwear with a minimalist aesthetic is enriched by an archive logo with a vintage finish printed in a contrasting color.
details: Regular fit|Stand-up collar|Zipper closure|Welt pockets|Regular shoulder|Straight hem|Unlined|Lettering logo printed on the front

name: Cotton blend jacket
description: The design of this cotton blend jacket blends contemporary minimalism and sporty influences. Clean lines form the sleek silhouette, characterized by a stand-up collar with buttons and zipper closure. The style is completed by an archive logo printed in a contrasting color.
